api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://goverlytics1.p.rapidapi.com/politician/437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goverlytics1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://goverlytics1.p.rapidapi.com/politician/{goverlytics_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goverlytics1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
